extendedInfo.description: The Edmunds app for Android combines Edmunds' pricing, research and inventory search into one powerful car shopping app to help you find and buy the new or used car you want at the best possible price. With this app you can configure a car to your requirements, see regional True Market ValueÂ® prices, find cars for sale at local dealers, and get details on available incentives.  Edmunds helps you negotiate your vehicle purchase with confidence.FEATURES: * With True Market ValueÂ® (TMVÂ®), Edmunds gives you the right price to target when negotiating for new and used cars with dealers or private sellers.  Configure a car based on its specifications for customized regional pricing. * See the Specs and Packages available on the car you're shopping for, including fuel economy, safety, and warranty details.* Find new or used cars for sale in your area and see which dealers have them in stock.* Save your new and used car research, inventory and dealers to your Saved list for easy access. * See the new car you're considering purchasing in all the colors it comes in the Color Options gallery.* Browse hi-res photos of your favorite cars, and save or email them right from the app.* Configure a new car you're considering purchasing to your specifications and e-mail the âEdmunds Window Stickerâ with the detailed specs and pricing summary. * Read Edmunds' expert reviews about cars you're researching, and also read what consumers who own them have to say.* Read dealer reviews, and see current new and used inventory for sale.

reviews.title: Was good but now crap
reviews.comment: Wtf was this update for what was wrong with the old one. The new ones slow and crappy.
reviews.author: Drew Beck

reviews.title: Fine update except...
reviews.comment: The update is fine except when you go to view different options on the same model, e.g. different engine options, the page doesn\'t show the correct info. Instead it still shows the same info regardless of the engine choice selected.  Please fix!
reviews.author: Richard Russo

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Forget about this app, it only let you view car listings by dealers. Can\'t read reviews or view photos. Just use the website.
reviews.author: Jimmy Le

reviews.title: Freezes up
reviews.comment: Tried closing and restarting. This app needs work.
reviews.author: David Maguire

reviews.title: Killed a good app
reviews.comment: Frustrated that all my saved vehicles are now gone. Also would be nice if there was some connection to the login for your website. Crashed when searching new BMWs.
reviews.author: Jeff Hoffman

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: New update crashes all the time.. need to fix!!!
reviews.author: james castro

reviews.title: New version is very bad.
reviews.comment: Nothing wrong with previous version.  New version has stripped out many great search features and now makes it much harder to find what you want.  Why oh why do you fix something that was not broken.
reviews.author: Jason Elledge

reviews.title: Previous version much better
reviews.comment: Let\'s take a wonderful tool to help you research your next car and make it worse.  That is what Edmunds did with this update.
reviews.author: John Piccini

reviews.title: Mileage
reviews.comment: The milage of the car is not listed under the car description and is not even listed or showing anywhere
reviews.author: James Mays

reviews.comment: Network connection problems
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good
reviews.comment: the update made the app less intuitive and all my saved vehicles are gone.
reviews.author: Cody Anderson

reviews.comment: Simply not working on Galaxy Note 10.1
reviews.author: Daniel Lee

reviews.title: Less user friendly
reviews.comment: New version is way less user friendly And makes navigating Edmund\'s much more difficult and crashes on occasion now
reviews.author: Joshua Parker

reviews.title: BETTER
reviews.comment: this is much better than the old one. better flow and thanks for actually making it \'android\'.
reviews.author: neil fernandez

reviews.title: Looks much better but
reviews.comment: Keep crashing when selecting 2014 bmw... Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not so hot app
reviews.comment: I liked the options of the previous version. This inner is too simplified. No descriptions of the options as you are trying to configure a vehicle, nor the cost adder. I Ann using another tool for three time being.
reviews.author: Paul Simmonds

reviews.title: Poor version
reviews.comment: The new version false sorts of Edmunds known quality. We no longer have the option to see car reviews I am very disappointed on my favorite car website
reviews.author: Michel Emerick

reviews.title: TERRIBLE UPDATE!
reviews.comment: I hate the new layout, the previous version you were able to see prices for package options on a car and able to save as favorite, able to see customer reviews, and also the layout was easier to navigate. This new version sucks!!! Edmunds please fix, ima start using another program instead!
reviews.author: Francisco Cardona

reviews.title: Incomplete; Update lost functionality
reviews.comment: Good for looking up reviews and quick specs/prices, but still incomplete.  Specs never change when selecting a different engine/trim from the drop down.  No used cars older than 2001?  Why did so many current models disappear?  Popular models simply don\'t exist.  Full size view on photo gallery pics still too small, full screen view would be ideal.  Would be useful to have Edmund\'s reliability chart accessible from app\'s used car. section since that\'s important when researching a used car.
reviews.author: Michael Ni

reviews.title: Old version please.
reviews.comment: I do not like this version of Edmund\'s. Its difficult and aggravating to navigate on. I liked the old version better you had more options to you when navigating and researching cars. Now everything is all cluster f**ked  and its irritating and sad for edmunds. I\'m sticking to the web version for now. Till they fix it. On mobile.
reviews.author: Corey Messenger
